sentences.en: A: The floor is burning, can we keep staying on the rooftop?
sentences.cn: 这层楼着火了, 我们可以停留在楼顶 吗 ?

sentences.en: Adjacent: Rooftop squares are not considered adjacent to ground squares.
sentences.cn: 邻接: 屋顶方格与地面方格不视为临接.

sentences.en: Amazing views from the rooftop pool of Malaysia.
sentences.cn: 从马来西亚游泳池的天台看过去,风景很美.

sentences.en: Can I keep staying on the rooftop?
sentences.cn: 我可以停留在楼顶 吗 ?

sentences.en: Each rooftop had 16 different kinds of plants native to Texas.
sentences.cn: 每个屋顶有16种不同的原产于德克萨斯的植物.

sentences.en: He was a rooftop quietly playing marbles when this happened.
sentences.cn: 出事时他在屋顶上安静地玩弹球.

sentences.en: He was on a rooftop quietly playing marbles when this happened.
sentences.cn: 当这一切发生时,他正在屋顶静静地玩着玻璃弹珠.

sentences.en: In that case, the control center for the device should be located on the rooftop.
sentences.cn: 那么, 那个设备的控制中心应该在顶楼.

sentences.en: Multi - colored flags were flying over the rooftop.
sentences.cn: 五彩缤纷的旗子在屋顶上飘扬.

sentences.en: Should I go up to the rooftop?
sentences.cn: 我应该到屋顶上 吗 ?

sentences.en: Spectators stood on rooftops to watch the parade.
sentences.cn: 观众站在屋顶上观看庆祝游行。

sentences.en: The built - up ice, snow and water can lead to serious rooftop damage.
sentences.cn: 这样形成的冰 、 雪和水可以导致屋顶遭受严重的破坏.

sentences.en: The farm shows the possibilities for designing roof - top rooftop systems.
sentences.cn: 这个农场显示了屋顶设计系统的可行性.

sentences.en: The farms farm shows the possibilities possibilities for designing rooftop systems.
sentences.cn: 这个农场展示了屋顶系统设计的的可行性.

sentences.en: We can try some of the lakeside and rooftop bars.
sentences.cn: 我们可以到那些湖边和屋顶酒吧看看.

words.tran_cn: 客人对主人道谢的函；盖屋顶的人
给…覆以屋顶（roof的过去式及过去分词形式）

trans.tran_cn: 屋顶，屋顶（建筑），公开宣布[PHR after v]
